trans-unit.source: Allows a customized view of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"></xref> to implement automation peer features that are specific to the custom view.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> that is used by this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the control type for the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the collection of immediate child elements of the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
The automation peers for the list items.
The automation peers for all items in the control.
If the view contains interactive or informational elements in addition to the list items, automation peers for these elements must be added to the list.
Gets the control pattern that is associated with the specified patternInterface.
Return the object that implements the control pattern.
If this method returns null, the return value from <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer.GetPattern(System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface)"></xref> is used.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> when the collection of items changes.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Called when the custom view is no longer applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref>.
